thig10.1:2.1: One should associate with good people,
thig10.1:2.2: as that is how wisdom grows.
thig10.1:2.3: If one associates with good people,
thig10.1:2.4: one would be freed from all suffering.
thig10.1:3.1: One would have knowledge of suffering,
thig10.1:3.2: the origin and cessation of suffering,
thig10.1:3.4: and also the Four Noble Truths.

thig10.1:7.4: all burnt on one funeral pyre.”
thig10.1:8.2: you have been through a lot of  suffering,
thig10.1:9.1: “I lived in the middle of the cemetery,
thig10.1:9.2: right by my child’s half-eaten flesh.
thig10.1:9.3: With family destroyed, blamed by all,

thig10.1:10.1: The way has been developed by me—
thig10.1:10.2: the Noble Eightfold Path leading to the deathless.
